title: Richard Porter (writer for Top Gear)
description:
This week we're joined by former BBC Top Gear Sript Wizard (Supervisor) Richard Porter (@SniffPetrol)! His new book, And On That Bombshell, chronicles his 13 years working on Top Gear. We tell him about Californian methamphetamime production, and he tells us all about how Top Gear was made, including Richard Hammond's skills at entering strip clubs.

Click here to get your copy of And On That Bombshell
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
